title: build: compile ARM go1.3.3
body:
by **avdoshkin**: 
gcc -v
Using built-in specs.
Target: arm-linux-gnueabi
Configured with: ../src/configure -v --with-pkgversion='Debian 4.4.5-8'
--with-bugurl=file:///usr/share/doc/gcc-4.4/README.Bugs
--enable-languages=c,c++,fortran,objc,obj-c++ --prefix=/usr --program-suffix=-4.4
--enable-shared --enable-multiarch --enable-linker-build-id --with-system-zlib
--libexecdir=/usr/lib --without-included-gettext --enable-threads=posix
--with-gxx-include-dir=/usr/include/c++/4.4 --libdir=/usr/lib --enable-nls
--enable-clocale=gnu --enable-libstdcxx-debug --enable-objc-gc --disable-sjlj-exceptions
--enable-checking=release --build=arm-linux-gnueabi --host=arm-linux-gnueabi
--target=arm-linux-gnueabi
Thread model: posix
gcc version 4.4.5 (Debian 4.4.5-8)


qemu-system-arm -M versatilepb -kernel vmlinuz-2.6.32-5-versatile -initrd
initrd.img-2.6.32-5-versatile -hda debian_squeeze_armel_standard.qcow2 -append
root=/dev/sda1 -nographic -net nic,macaddr=00:16:3e:00:00:01 -net tap

root@debian-armel:/home/go/src# uname -a
Linux debian-armel 2.6.32-5-versatile #1 Wed Sep 25 00:01:55 UTC 2013 armv5tejl GNU/Linux

root@debian-armel:/home/go/src# cat /proc/cpuinfo 
Processor	: ARM926EJ-S rev 5 (v5l)
BogoMIPS	: 838.86
Features	: swp half thumb fastmult vfp edsp java 
CPU implementer	: 0x41
CPU architecture: 5TEJ
CPU variant	: 0x0
CPU part	: 0x926
CPU revision	: 5

Hardware	: ARM-Versatile PB
Revision	: 0000
Serial		: 0000000000000000


root@debian-armel:/home/go/src# ./all.bash

--- FAIL: TestCgoCrashHandler (5.78 seconds)
	crash_test.go:85: output:
		# command-line-arguments
		/usr/bin/ld: /var/tmp/go-link-ef0Ati/000001.o: warning: duplicate section `.note.gnu.build-id' has different contents
		main: recovered done
		new-thread: recovered done
		second-new-thread: recovered done
		main-again: recovered done
		
		
		wanted:
		main: recovered done
		new-thread: recovered done
		second-new-thread: recovered done
		main-again: recovered done
--- FAIL: TestCgoSignalDeadlock (6.07 seconds)
	crash_cgo_test.go:25: expected "OK\n", but got "# command-line-arguments\n/usr/bin/ld: /var/tmp/go-link-8n809w/000001.o: warning: duplicate section `.note.gnu.build-id' has different contents\nOK\n"
--- FAIL: TestCgoTraceback (5.75 seconds)

FAIL
